TUTORS HELP YOU WITH YOUR ONLINE COLLEGE IN THE USA
NURSING CAREER

If you are a college student in the United States of America (USA), you know how challenging it can be to manage multiple subjects and courses at the same time. Complex assignments in various subjects can turn into a nightmare if you do not have the time or the right guidance. This is where our help service with WITH YOUR ONLINE COLLEGE comes in: a reliable, personalized resource available in all US states.

How does it work?

1
Request
Request your course online

Request here 👆
2
Contact
A moderator will contact you to answer any questions you may have.
3
Cancellation
Cancel the value of the consultancy, calculated according to the hours of the meeting.
4
Assignment
You will be assigned an advisor to guide you through the entire process.

Frequently Asked Questions

How is the quotation process for an online course?
1. Contact us

👉


2. Wait for a moderator to contact you, who will send you the quote for the online course.

3. Payment is made in the fifth week of the course before it ends.
Does the online course have any cost? How much time in advance should I apply for the online course?
There is a cost. Unfortunately, we cannot offer free online courses because we are an established company with set processes, and everyone’s time is valuable.
How much time in advance should I apply for the online course?
At least 24 hours in advance, but it depends on the length and requirements of the online course. It will be reviewed to see if it is possible to provide a quote.
What guarantees do I get for the online course?
All the online courses we offer come with a guarantee of a high grade. In the event of any error, you will receive a full refund, and the person responsible will be terminated.
Is it only for online courses?
We focus mainly on online courses, but we can review your request to confirm if it can be accommodated and quoted.
Is my money safe?
If you are sure, for your peace of mind, we charge you in the last week of the course so that you have the guarantee that the course will be completed successfully.
How much is the average fee for an online course?
The average fee for an online course is around 150 USD. It can be adjusted for any specific request.
Is it only possible to pay with zelle?
You can make the payment through different methods, either by ZELLE or MasterCard. We want to expand to virtual currencies, but at the moment this option is not available.
Are the advisors experts in online courses?
We have a team of expert advisors in different academic areas and in the completion of online courses. We guarantee satisfactory courses and maximum scores.
What are the opening hours?
We are a digital company available 100% of the time, but we must keep in mind that our moderators and advisors need time to rest, eat, and sleep. For this reason, we need to give them their time to ensure agility in the online course quotation process.

Payments methods

Academic Assistance for Students of Latino Origin: Specialized Service in the U.S.

One of our main priorities is to provide academic assistance to students of Latino origin residing in the United States of America. Our team is prepared to provide you with the support you need to succeed academically because we know that adjusting to the university environment in a new country can be difficult. The service is offered in the US states where we have the largest number of student clients such as Florida, Washington, Illinois, Texas, California, North Carolina, Georgia, Virginia, Iowa, Wyoming, and New Jersey. Tutors mainly do your college assignments in the United States, in the cities of Miami, Orlando, Chicago, Hialeah, Dallas, Los Angeles, Charlotte, Atlanta, and Des Moines. Over the course of the 4 or 5 years that this career has, you will see a little more than 30 subjects. Although, of course, this may vary according to the curriculum of each educational institution. Even so, regardless of the university you choose, we will help you in the different subjects where you will learn from the basics to the most advanced knowledge, in order to provide quality service in any public or private health center.

We are available for all cycles and all subjects:

Introductory Cycle

Introduction to Nursing
Anatomy and Physiology
Basic Nursing
General Psychology
Biology
Biochemistry
Morphophysiology I and II
Public Health
Nutrition
Microbiology and Parasitology

Intermediate Training Cycle

Nursing Language
Growth and Development I and II
Basic and Applied Pharmacology
Community Nursing
Biostatistics
Obstetric and Gynecological Nursing
Pediatric Nursing
Clinical Nursing Clinical- Adult and Elderly Surgical Nursing
Ecology and Health
Professional Ethics

Professional Integration Cycle

First Aid
Mental Health and Psychiatry Nursing
Palliative Care Management
Advanced Clinical Nursing
Advanced Surgical Nursing
Advanced Pediatric Nursing
Advanced Obstetric and Gynecological
